mapper.select: select * from PURCHASEORDER po, PRODUCT prod WHERE po.PRODSEQ = prod.PRODSEQ AND po.CUSSEQ=#{cusSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into PURCHASEORDER (PONUM, CUSSEQ, PRODSEQ, POQUANTITY,RECIPIENT,RECIPIENTPHONE,RECIPIENTADDR,SHIPMEMO,BILLINGAMOUNT,PAYMETHOD, POSTAT) values (PONUM_SEQ.nextval,#{cusSeq}, #{prodSeq}, #{poQuantity}, #{recipient},#{recipientPhone}, #{recipientAddr},#{shipMemo}, #{billingAmount}, #{payMethod}, #{poStat})
mapper.select: select * from PURCHASEORDER po, PRODUCT prod WHERE po.PRODSEQ = prod.PRODSEQ AND prod.SELLERSEQ=#{sellerSeq} AND po.POSTAT = 'newOrder'
mapper.update: update PURCHASEORDER set CONFIRMDATE=sysdate where PONUM=#{poNum}
update PURCHASEORDER set SHIPDATE=sysdate where PONUM=#{poNum}
